item.title: New event. Heat Advisory from 8/29/2024 12:00 PM to 8:00 PM
item.description: New event. Heat Advisory from 8/29/2024 12:00 PM to 8:00 PM EDT for Cabell County, WV, Lincoln County, WV, Wa...

item.title: Heat Advisories will be needed across the lowlands Thursday
item.description: Heat Advisories will be needed across the lowlands Thursday and Friday afternoons, as health impacts remain possible to vulnerable populations, as well as those working or recreating outdoors. Actions: 1. Drink plenty of water. 2. Wear light, loose fitting clothing. 3. Rest often in shaded or air conditioned locations. 4. Never leave children or pets unattended in vehicles. 5. Check on family and friends.

item.title: WV Drought Activates SBA Disaster Loan Program: The declarat
item.description: WV Drought Activates SBA Disaster Loan Program: The declaration includes the primary counties of Calhoun, Gilmer, Jackson, Kanawha, Mason, Putnam, Roane, and Wirt and the adjacent counties of Boone, Braxton, Cabell, Clay, Doddridge, Fayette, Lewis, Lincoln, Nicholas, Raleigh, Ritchie, and Wood. Learn more: https://bit.ly/3Xl3AJ6
